# JakeR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is just a set of custom functions I wrote that I use most days in my workflow.

## Installation

You can install the development version of JakeR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jake-wittman/JakeR")
```
